author: Home RenoVision DIY
description:
Worried about leaks in your shower renovation? In this step-by-step video, I show you how to build a 100% leak-proof shower using a fully customized Redi Your Way shower pan and Schluter’s Kerdi waterproofing system, so you can have peace of mind and avoid costly water damage. If you found this video helpful, please subscribe. Hope you enjoy. Cheers! Watch all of the videos from the new project 👉🏼https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL34cQkzKfXWbw0cvItwuNkLOpdJF7gu18

title: How to Build a 100% Leak Proof Shower (And Avoid Disaster)
